r.d: Spreadsheet_Excel_Writer was born as a porting of the Spreadsheet::WriteExcel Perl module to PHP. It allows writing of Excel spreadsheets without the need for COM objects. It supports formulas, images (BMP) and all kinds of formatting for text and cells. It currently supports the BIFF5 format (Excel 5.0), so functionality appeared in the latest Excel versions is not yet available.
r.n: New features: -using OLE package to generate files bigger than 7MB -changed setFgColor() and setBgColor()'s behavior to something more intuitive. Bug fixes: -fixed bug #25133, lowercase cell references (jkwiat03 at hotmail dot com) -fixed Bug #23730, worksheet names containing spaces in formulas (Robin Ericsson) -fixed Bug #24147, formulas ended in '0' (paul at classical dot com) -fixed swapping of arguments in variable arguments functions (JT Hughes)
